metadata.dc:subject: NERVOUS SYSTEM, CENTRAL
ENCEPHALITIS
metadata.dc:title: A propósito de un syndrome post-encefalitico, con localizatión preferente en el sistema cerebelo-rubro-espinal.
[Post-encephalitic syndrome with preferential localization in the cerebello-rubrospinal system].
